summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential meeting in New York on December 12, 2009, for cocktails with another individual named Peter. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a meeting.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

persons.context: Peter is mentioned as a third party with whom Epstein and Staley are considering meeting for cocktails.

events.title: Cocktails Meeting
events.description: A proposed meeting for cocktails in New York involving Jeffrey Epstein, Jes Staley, and Peter.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a meeting.
The meeting is proposed for December 12, 2009.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
Peter is mentioned as a third party for the proposed meeting.
